mapper.select: SELECT a._id AS _id, a.description AS description, a.icon_image_id AS icon_image_id, a.default_anthology_id AS default_anthology_id, a.additional_info_id AS additional_info_id FROM author a INNER JOIN authentication_author aa ON a._id = aa.author_id WHERE aa.authentication_id = #{authenticationId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO author (icon_image_id, description, default_anthology_id, additional_info_id) VALUES (#{iconImageId}, #{description}, #{defaultAnthologyId}, #{additionalInfoId})
